response.explain: The previous action code has successfully put the bottle of shampoo inside the carton, which is the final subtask. Therefore, no further actions are required.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the bottle of shampoo.
(2) Grasp the bottle of shampoo.
(3) Move the robot to the carton.
(4) Open the carton.
(5) Put the bottle of shampoo inside the carton.
response.code: # No further code is required as the task has been completed.
